titleStmt.title: A playne declaration made at Oxforde the 24. daye of July, by mayster Richarde Smyth, Doctor of diuinite, vpon hys Retractation made [and] published at Paules crosse in London, in the yeare of our lorde God, D.D.xlvii. the xv. daye of May
titleStmt.author: Smith, Richard, 1500-1563.
Smith, Richard, 1500-1563. Godly and faythfull retractation. aut

notesStmt.note: Includes text of Smith's "A godly and faythfull retractation" (STC 22822).
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
